verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.africanmining.co.za/2025/06/01/exploring-pmc-so-much-more-than-a-mine-part-1/. Palabora Copper is located in the northeastern part of Limpopo province, adjacent to Kruger National Park

web_search_companies.notes: Palabora Copper is a subsidiary of the Palabora Mining Company, which has undergone ownership changes over the years.
